Arliss Howard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arliss_Howard 0 Arliss Howard (born Leslie Richard Howard; October 18, 1954) is an American actor, writer and film director. Arliss_Howard ( born Leslie_Richard_Howard ; October_18_,_1954 ) is an_American_actor_,_writer_and_film_director .
